title: Feature: Enhance AWIN Widget with Website Links and Reject Button
body:
## 🎯 Overview
This pull request enhances the AWIN Program Management widget with two new key features:
1. **Website Column** - Clickable links to affiliate program websites
2. **Reject Button** - Ability to reject programs with real-time status updates

## ✅ What's Changed

### Frontend Changes (`src/components/dashboard/AWINProgramManagement.tsx`)
- ➕ **New "Website" Column**: Added table header and clickable links for each program
- ➕ **Website Links**: Implemented `<a>` tags with `target="_blank"` using existing `click_through_url` data
- ➕ **Reject Button**: Added "Reject" button alongside existing "Apply" button
- ➕ **Conditional Rendering**: Both buttons now only appear for programs with 'Not Applied' status
- ➕ **Real-time Updates**: Enhanced UI responsiveness for immediate status change feedback
- ➕ **New Handler**: Implemented `handleReject` function to process rejection requests

### Backend Changes (`supabase/functions/awin-program-management/index.ts`)
- ➕ **Enhanced Edge Function**: Extended existing function to handle both 'apply_to_program' and 'reject_program' actions
- ➕ **Reject Logic**: Added database update logic to set program status to 'Rejected'
- ➕ **Action-based Routing**: Implemented request body inspection to determine appropriate action
- ✅ **Backward Compatibility**: Maintained full compatibility with existing apply functionality

## 🧪 Testing Status
- ✅ **End-to-End Testing**: Comprehensive testing completed on deployed application
- ✅ **Website Links**: Confirmed links open correctly in new tabs
- ✅ **Reject Functionality**: Verified successful status updates (Console: "Successfully rejected program 83693")
- ✅ **Apply Functionality**: Confirmed existing functionality remains intact (Console: "Successfully applied to program 6095")
- ✅ **Real-time Updates**: Verified immediate UI updates across all status changes
- ✅ **Conditional UI**: Confirmed buttons show/hide correctly based on program status

## 🔧 Technical Implementation

### Database Schema
- Uses existing `click_through_url` field for website links
- Updates `application_status` field to 'Rejected' when reject action is called
- No schema changes required - leverages existing data structure

### API Integration
- **Single Endpoint**: Consolidated approach using one edge function for both actions
- **Request Format**: 
```json
{
  "action": "reject_program",
  "programme_id": "12345"
}
```
- **Response Handling**: Real-time UI updates based on successful API responses

### UI/UX Enhancements
- **Accessibility**: Proper `target="_blank"` and `rel="noopener noreferrer"` for external links
- **Visual Consistency**: Maintains existing TailwindCSS design patterns
- **User Feedback**: Immediate visual feedback for all user actions
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-friendly implementation preserved

## 🚀 Deployment Information
- **Live URL**: https://79h2ua1zq7ee.space.minimax.io
- **Branch**: `feature/enhance-awin-widget`
- **Base Branch**: `main`
- **Deployment Status**: ✅ Successfully deployed and functional

## 📋 Files Modified
1. `src/components/dashboard/AWINProgramManagement.tsx` - Frontend component enhancements
2. `supabase/functions/awin-program-management/index.ts` - Backend API enhancements

## 🎉 Impact
These enhancements significantly improve the affiliate program management workflow by:
- **Reducing Research Time**: Direct access to affiliate program websites
- **Improving Organization**: Ability to reject unwanted programs maintains a clean pipeline
- **Enhancing User Experience**: Real-time updates and intuitive interface
- **Maintaining Performance**: No additional database calls - optimized single-function approach
